name: Null Breach
storyline:
Meex, an interdimensional being, created this world. But something went wrong. Upon entering his newly created dimension he was horrified to discover that it has fallen apart. There was only void with some scattered landmasses.

This worlds time runs out and Meex is lost in this dimension. Collect Time Orbs and defeat Void Eater to gain more time. Unlock new abilities and save your dimension
summary:
Lost in a collapsing dimension. It's time runs out. Can you save it from it's demise?

A 2D Roguelike Platformer. Be fast, precise and spend your time wisely. Can you get all 10 abilities? How long will you be able to survive?

You play as Meex, the creator of this dimension. But something went wrong. Upon entering his newly created world he was horrified to discover that it has fallen apart. There was only void with some scattered landmasses.

This worlds time runs out and Meex is lost in this dimension. Collect Time Orbs and defeat Void Eater to gain more time. Unlock new abilities and save your dimension.
